solution_line_template: First find the total amount of time he spends trying to get off the freeway: {waiting_in_traffic_hours} hours * {times_longer} = <<{waiting_in_traffic_hours}*{times_longer}={get_off_freeway_hours}>>{get_off_freeway_hours} hours

Then add the time he spends waiting in traffic to find the total time: {get_off_freeway_hours} hours + {waiting_in_traffic_hours} hours = <<{get_off_freeway_hours}+{waiting_in_traffic_hours}={total_time_wasted}>>{total_time_wasted} hours
